## Monitoring Status

This page monitors specific clinical trials and highlights any updates in their status or key fields.

[Download Status Summary (CSV)](data/status_summary.csv)

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
import json
import os

summary_path = "data/status_summary.json"
if os.path.exists(summary_path):
    with open(summary_path, "r") as f:
        summary = json.load(f)
    
    print("| Trial ID | Sponsor | Update | Status | Conditions | Phases | Start | End | Enroll | Last Updated |")
    print("| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |")
    for item in summary:
        update_color = "ðŸŸ¢" if item.get('monitor_status') == "No Change" else "ðŸ”´"
        print(f"| [{item['id']}](https://clinicaltrials.gov/study/{item['id']}) | {item.get('sponsor', 'N/A')} | {update_color} {item.get('monitor_status')} | {item.get('status', 'N/A')} | {item.get('conditions', 'N/A')} | {item.get('phases', 'N/A')} | {item.get('study_start', 'N/A')} | {item.get('study_end', 'N/A')} | {item.get('enrollment', 'N/A')} | {item.get('last_updated', 'N/A')} |")
else:
    print("No monitoring data available yet.")
```
